scripts.combine:css: concat-cli -f styles/base/*.css styles/foundation/*.css styles/variables/*.css styles/layout/*.css styles/components/*.css styles/utilities/*.css styles/custom.css -o styles/vanilla-combined.css
scripts.build:css: npm run combine:css && npm run purge:css && npm run minify:css
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch styles/ --watch tokens/ --ext css,json --exec 'npm run build:css && npm run css2tokens && npm run tokens2css'
